verbs.description: So much for TGIF . [ARG1: Stocks] [V: sank] [ARGM-TMP: after President Trump announced $ 50 billion in new tariffs on Chinese imports Friday , escalating worries about a trade war between the United States and China . China immediately responded with tariffs of its own , which could hurt US businesses] .

China immediately responded with tariffs of its own , which could hurt US businesses .
